BIC: 

Tucson nodds t=
o Kup and Windlord as he extends his hands to them.

"Thank you both, it's =
an honor to have you aboard on this mission."

Night Shift also approaches =
them.

"This is cool, because if anyone knows the layout of that place, I b=
et Windlord does.  He's been there and probably knows all the ins'n outs. A=
nd then Kup, maaan, if anyone can fight off an army, it's him. Sweet, we go=
t ourselves a team formn' here."

Straight Shot looks up to Kup.

"Hmm, I t=
hink for now, I better go with Kup.  After all, I'm not exclusively for Tuc=
son's use only.  Okay Kup, your choice, cross bow or traditional bow?"
